Items.Detail: Best Effort Explicit Analog Television Output Restriction
Digital Only Token - must disable all analog outputs for video
ACP engage Automatic Gain Control (ACG) and color stripe
Image constraint for Analog Computer Monitor Output: downres to 520,000 pixels if playing on VGA - MAX_VGA_RESOLUTION; 0xAABB
Image constraint for Analog Component Video Output:downres to 520,000 pixels if playing on another analog output
either engage SCMS or playing on HDMI and engage HDCP
engage HDCP type 1 on any HDCP-enabled output - only allow to set on uncompressedDigital OPL=300
